channel.title: definition on GraphQL Java Kickstart
channel.description: Recent content in definition on GraphQL Java Kickstart

item.title: Type Definition Factory
item.description: The Type Definition Factory has been added with to be able to dynamically add type definitions to the schema instead of having to define them manually in the SDL. There are a couple of use cases where the types that have to be defined are very much alike and only certain parts are different. For example the connection and edge types used by Relay. Since generics isn’t supported in the definition language this type definition factory has been added.
